CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironclad Ventures relative to Starlight Innovations?
SRP.A: Ironclad Ventures is {below} Starlight Innovations in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Vanguard Dynamics relative to NovaTech Solutions?
SRP.A: Vanguard Dynamics is {above} NovaTech Solutions in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Vanguard Dynamics relative to Horizon Enterprises?
SRP.A: Vanguard Dynamics is {above} Horizon Enterprises in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total market share?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Vanguard Dynamics}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total market share?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Aegis Corp}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Aegis Corp's maximum Market Share in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Aegis Corp's maximum Market Share is in {1956}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Starlight Innovations's minimum Market Share in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Starlight Innovations's minimum Market Share is in {1956}.

NC.Q: Between 1963 and 1965, did the total Market Share experience a larger or smaller change than between 1958 and 1966?
NC.A: The change in total market share between 1963 and 1965 was {smaller} than between 1958 and 1966.

NC.Q: Between 1966 and 1973, did the total Market Share experience a larger or smaller change than between 1956 and 1973?
NC.A: The change in total market share between 1966 and 1973 was {smaller} than between 1956 and 1973.

NC.Q: Between 1971 and 1973, did the total Market Share experience a larger or smaller change than between 1961 and 1973?
NC.A: The change in total market share between 1971 and 1973 was {smaller} than between 1961 and 1973.

NC.Q: Between 1959 and 1961, was the average total Market Share higher or lower than between 1959 and 1966?
NC.A: The average total market share between 1959 and 1961 was {lower} than between 1959 and 1966.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Starlight Innovations} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Horizon Enterprises and Apex Systems first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Horizon Enterprises and Apex Systems did not exchange leading positions.
